headline: APP Investor Alert: Kessler Topaz Meltzer & Check, LLP Urges APP Investors With Losses to Contact the Firm
summary: The law firm of Kessler Topaz Meltzer & Check, LLP informs investors that securities class action lawsuits have been filed against AppLovin Corporation on behalf of those who purchased or otherwise...

headline: Why Applovin Plunged in March
summary: Shares of digital advertising up-and-comer Applovin (NASDAQ: APP) plunged 18.2% in March, according to data from S&P Global Market Intelligence.  Applovin already had a rough February, when it was hit by two short-seller reports.  On March 27, a short-selling hedge fund manager under the name Muddy Waters published a short report against Applovin.
